amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide policy provisions that the Secretary and Administrator would be prohibited from including in a final rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 248 (Roll no. 486).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 248 (Roll no. 486).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Bishop (NY).
